comment:
Nose: Overwhelming young (ginny) nose pre-water drip
Rich
Sugar cookie
Vanilla ice cream
Pecans

Taste: Caramel Buttery sweetness, like sweet cream, probably from millet
Lightly peppery Lovely mouthfeel, like melted ice cream

Overall a lot of potential, but would benefit a lot with a full 4 years in the barrel, IMO.
